mapper.select: select * from product_info as a left join product_file as b on a.index = b.pf_product_id order by a.mk_register_date desc;
select * from product_info as a left join product_file as b on a.index = b.pf_product_id where a.mk_product_discount_price is not null order by a.mk_register_date desc;
select * from product_info as a left join product_file as b on a.index = b.pf_product_id order by a.mk_sold_number desc;
